1546200.name: Fantasy Grounds - Referee's Briefing 5: Incidents and Encounters
1546200.description:
Referee's Briefing 5: Incidents and Encounters

Referee's Briefing 5: Incidents and Encounters presents a collection of incidents and details of local colour that can be slipped into a campaign wherever it will make the Travellers' lives that little bit richer.
As Travellers voyage from one world to another, things happen to them. Often little things, trivial things; incidents that cause a minor inconvenience or unnecessary aggravation during what should be routine planetfall. However, some of these little incidents can lead to adventure, or complicate what would otherwise have been a straightforward task.
Referee's Briefing 5: Incidents and Encounters presents a collection of incidents and details of local colour that can be slipped into a campaign wherever it will make the Travellers' lives that little bit richer.
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Traveller 2E (Mongoose) ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
